plot: Shortly after his ninth birthday, Eugenio awakens unexpectedly with a full-grown mustache. Surviving its consequences, Eugenio moves forward while discovering the origin of his condition and finding his place in the world.
title: Eugenio
plot_es: Shortly after his ninth birthday, Eugenio awakens unexpectedly with a full-grown mustache. Surviving its consequences, Eugenio moves forward while discovering the origin of his condition and finding his place in the world.
